Fuming.description: Can only clue numbers and [random color]

Dumbfounded.description: Can only clue colors and [random number]

Inept.description: Cannot give any clues that touch [random color] cards

Awkward.description: Cannot give any clues that touch [random number]s

Conservative.description: Can only give clues that touch a single card

Greedy.description: Can only give clues that touch 2+ cards

Picky.description: Can only clue odd numbers or odd colors

Spiteful.description: Cannot clue the player to their left

Insolent.description: Cannot clue the player to their right

Vindictive.description: Must clue if they received a clue since their last turn

Miser.description: Can only clue if there are 4 or more clues available

Compulsive.description: Can only clue if it touches the newest or oldest card in someone's hand

Mood Swings.description: Clues given must alternate between color and number

Insistent.description: Must continue to clue cards until one of them is played or discarded

Vulnerable.description: Cannot receive a number 2 or number 5 clue

Follower.description: Cannot play a card unless two cards of the same rank have already been played

Impulsive.description: Must play slot 1 if it has been clued

Indolent.description: Cannot play a card if they played on the last round

Anxious.description: Cannot discard if there is an even number of clues available (including 0)

Traumatized.description: Cannot discard if there is an odd number of clues available

Wasteful.description: Cannot discard if there are 2 or more clues available

Genius.description: Must clue both a number and a color (uses 2 clues)

Synesthetic.description: Must clue both a number and a color of the same value (uses 1 clue)

Panicky.description: When discarding, discards twice if 4 clues or less

Contrarian.description: Play order inverts after taking a turn, 2-turn end game

Stubborn.description: Must perform a different action type than the player that came before them

Blind Spot.description: Cannot see the cards of the player to their left

Oblivious.description: Cannot see the cards of the player to their right
